survey.title: Lifestyle Survey
survey.description: This survey helps us find compatible roommates for you. Your answers will be visible to other users.
survey.complete: You have already completed the survey
survey.notCompleted: You haven't completed the survey yet

questions.1: What is your typical daily schedule and what are your life priorities?
questions.2: How do you feel about religious practices and traditions?
questions.3: What is your attitude towards smoking and alcoholic beverages?
questions.4: What is your attitude towards guests in the house?
questions.5: How do you feel about pets?
questions.6: How do you feel about sharing household duties?
questions.7: Would you be comfortable if roommates frequently call friends/relatives?
questions.8: What is your attitude towards noise and using loud devices (music, TV)?

schedule.home: I spend the whole day at home, working/studying remotely. It's important for me to have a calm environment at home.
schedule.out: I'm constantly out and about, essentially my studies/work take the whole day. I don't care what happens at home in my absence.

religion.practice: I observe religious practices and traditions. I would like my neighbors to respect this.
religion.respect: I don't practice, but it's important that it doesn't bother my neighbors, and that my neighbors don't impose their traditions on me.

smoking.tolerant: I'm comfortable with smoking and alcohol, but would prefer it to happen in common areas.
smoking.against: I don't smoke or drink, and would like to live with people with similar habits.

guests.okay: I don't mind if neighbors frequently invite guests.
guests.neutral: I don't care, as I spend most of my time outside the home.

pets.like: I don't mind if neighbors have pets. I love pets myself.
pets.dislike: I prefer to live without pets to avoid extra noise or smells.

chores.equal: I prefer equal division of household duties.
chores.more: I'm ready to take on most of the household tasks.

calls.neutral: I don't care, as I spend little time at home.
calls.quiet: I prefer quiet and calm, so noisy conversations are undesirable.

noise.tolerant: I don't mind music or loud devices if it's not late in the evening.
noise.quiet: I prefer quiet and minimal use of loud devices.
